item.title: Chaincode Decoded: UTXOs
item.description: Introduction John Newbery: 00:00:00 If we go back in time to version 0.1, all that was stored was the blockchain and I think a marker saying whether that coin was spent or not. I mean that’s okay for your first version but it doesn’t really scale and it’s bad performance because every time you want to access a coin you need to read it from disk. Adam Jonas: 00:00:28 Welcome back to the Chaincode Podcast.
